description:
The fireworks festival is about to begin, and love is in the air. Mario has fallen for “Akemi,” straining his friendship with Kan. To confess his love, Mario decides to craft his own firework display with the help of his uncle, the pyrotechnician.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dream Date at the Fireworks Festival
Risou no Hanabi Date! no Hanashi
理想の花火デート! の話
